SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface ClientInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUIApplication
public interface ClientInterface
The ClientInterface interface defines the methods that a client implementation should provide for interacting with the game. These methods are used to obtain and display information, as well as to prompt the user for input during the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askColumn()
    Asks the user to input the column.
    void
    askCoordinates()
    Asks the user to input coordinates of the board to select tiles.
    void
    askLobbyDecision()
    Asks the user to make a decision regarding the lobby.
    void
    askNicknameAndConnection()
    Asks the user to input a nickname and establish a connection to the server.
    void
    askOrder()
    Asks the user to input the order of tiles selected.
    void
    displayError(String error)
    Displays an error message to the user.
    void
    displayMessage(String message)
    Displays a general message to the user.
    void
    displayToken(int num, String nickname)
    Displays the token won with the score won and nickname.
    void
    endGame(int[] personalPoints, String playerBookshelfFull)
    Displays the end game results.
    ClientView
    getClientView()
    Returns the current view of the client.
    void
    onlyPlayer()
    Notifies the user that he is the only player in the game.
    void
    waitingRoom()
    Displays the waiting room screen, where players wait for their turn.

    • getClientView

      ClientView getClientView()
      Returns the current view of the client.
      Returns:

    • waitingRoom

      Displays the waiting room screen, where players wait for their turn.

    • displayToken

      Displays the token won with the score won and nickname.
      Parameters:
      num - The player score won.
      nickname - The player nickname.

      Asks the user to input coordinates of the board to select tiles.

      Asks the user to input the column.

      Displays an error message to the user.
      Parameters:

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(String message)
      Displays a general message to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display.

    • askNicknameAndConnection

    • endGame

      void endGame(int[] personalPoints, String playerBookshelfFull)
      Displays the end game results.
      Parameters:
      personalPoints - The array of personal points for each player.
      playerBookshelfFull - The nickname of the player with a full bookshelf.

    • onlyPlayer

      void onlyPlayer()
      Notifies the user that he is the only player in the game.
